diff_act: 1.provide seamless transitioning between manual and autonomous control modes
2.provide real-time alerts and notifications when any UAV exceeds its preset operational limits
3.ensure immediate corrective actions to maintain safe flight operations
4.allow for seamless control handoff between manual and autonomous control systems
5.enable operators to dynamically toggle between different control modes
7.provide alerts whenever operational parameters exceed the defined presets
8.alert the operator when preset flight operation limits have been exceeded
9.define preset operational limits for both manual and autonomous modes
10.trigger appropriate alerts when operational limits are breached

regen.absent_element: alerting when UAV operations exceed preset operational limits
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall provide real-time alerts when any UAV exceeds its preset operational limits to ensure safe and efficient operations.

regen.absent_element: alert when UAV operational limits are exceeded
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall provide real-time alerts and notifications whenever UAVs exceed predefined operational limits in order to ensure safe and efficient UAV operations.

regen.absent_element: generation of alerts when UAVs exceed preset operational limits
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall provide real-time alerts and notifications whenever a UAV exceeds its preset operational limits to ensure safe and efficient operations.

label: TCS shall notify the operator when AV performance parameters are out of limits.
absence: action of notifying the operator when AV performance parameters are out of limits.
